channel.title: How do you change the max hit? and req's for spells/wepons/armor?
channel.description:
How do you change the max hit? and req's for spells/wepons/armor?
please help!! people hit way too high on my server and i wanna set reqs for spells armor and weapons
And does anyone know how to make it so u need runes for spells?

item.title: How do you change the max hit? and req's for spells/wepons/armor?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

And then if your experience is calculated by your hit, your experience will decrease! gasps

item.title: How do you change the max hit? and req's for spells/wepons/armor?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

[quote=“scootkid, post:6, topic:178944”]Well pretty much all that changes how much you hit is the STR BONUS… so change that and it should raise or lower it…
YOU CAN GO INTO NEGATIVES… Just So You Know…[/quote]
You can go into negatives, but your damage will be like all blue. You will hit like 50 but in blue damage counters.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you change the max hit? and req's for spells/wepons/armor?
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

Well i do know the max hit for weapons, armor, and spells
Weapons and Armor-
Open your item.cfg file
Search Whatever item name or id you want to change…
This Is What it Changes-

[code]item = ITEM ID ITEM NAME ITEM DESCRIPTION (IDK…) SELLTOSTORE PRICE BUYFROMSTORE PRICE STAB SLASH CRUSH MAGIC RANGE (DEF) STAB SLASH CRUSH MAGIC RANGE STRENGTH PRAYER

item = 1305 Dragon_longsword A_very_powerful_sword. 61608.0013642381 61608.0013642381 80929.5918252946 58 69 2 0 0 0 3 2 0 0 100 0
[/code]

NOTE- Some Server have a variable in which they divide or multiply prices so it may not be exact for your server… if not then simply go into the game and change a price, then take whatever the game price is and divide the item.cgf’s price by that to find what 1gp = in item.cgf

Hope That Help. Tell Me If You Need Any Help.
You’re Very Welcome LOL

Read full topic
item.source: How do you change the max hit? and req's for spells/wepons/armor?
